page.title: 17OUR LOCAL CHIPPY
page.content: Our local chippy is on Brook Road. It is a very clean shop with new deep fat fryers and a long counter for recieving your order. Their chips are the best around. They also sell pies, gravy, curry, peas and much more. Sausages come in jumbo size, which cost 30p. or small hotdogs which cost 15p. Fish are 52p. chips are 32p. and chip-barmcakes are 30p. The owners are Derek and Launa. Derek fries and Launa, with other women, serve. Launa is the most generous with the chips. Usually there is a long line of hungry, patient people. They're so long because the food is so nice. Small children with their parents are often given free sweets when ordering and there is always a cheerful smile with sevice. They ask if you want salt and vinegar, and brown or tomato sauce is free.
